title: There is no watch mission in the website
body:
https://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/watch-missions-2018-world-championship
This article said there will be some watch missions in the website watch.lolesports.com/rewards since 30 September, but there is nothing now.{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Fixed now? It was about the time you posted that I and some others were doing ours. The mission went up with the start of the stream.

https://i.imgur.com/VpnzSCh.png?noredirect

This is what I see. The mission also appeared in my client. Are you logged into the site?

https://i.imgur.com/CKOJi6K.png[/img]
 
I see like this. There is no mission. Can you share your website?

If you're seeing the stream you're on the wrong page, you have to be on the rewards page you linked above (watch.lolesports.com/rewards) to see the mission page. It should also appear in your game client.

https://i.imgur.com/bfaosz6.png[/img]
There is nothing, I don't know why.
Thank you, I have solved it. Only using the IE browser can I see the website.  There must be something wrong but I can't find it. I will use IE when I do this mission.
It's certainly strange, glad you've managed it though! Do you normally use one of the smaller browsers like Opera or Safari? Oftentimes pages won't have full support for those browsers.
Yes, I agree with you. Thank you.{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
